title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards on Odd Jobs
content:
Supplement your GTA Online criminal endeavors by moonlighting with Odd Jobs — legal and legitimate ways of earning money that keep Los Santos’ economy humming, and they’re all paying out Double Rewards through August 6.

Protect assets for Gruppe Sechs and Bobcat Security in Safeguard, make medical courier deliveries for QuickiePharm, deliver pies for Pizza This…, and safely transport passengers in Taxi Work. All can be launched by heading over to their respective blips around the city.
